name: cfpresentation
description:
Defines the look and feel of a dynamic slide presentation.
 Use the cfpresentation tag as the parent tag for one or more cfpresentationslide tags,
 where you define the content for the presentation.

params.name: title
params.description: Specifies the title of the presentation.

params.name: backgroundColor
params.description:
Specifies the background color of the presentation.
 The value is hexadecimal: use the form "##xxxxxx" or "##xxxxxxxx",
 where x = 0-9 or A-F; use two number signs or none.

params.name: control
params.description: Specifies the presentation control:

params.name: controlLocation
params.description: Specifies the location of the presentation control:

params.name: directory
params.description:
Specifies the directory where the presentation is saved.
 This can be absolute path or a path relative to the CFM page.
 ColdFusion automatically generates the files necessary to
 run the presentation, including:
 index.htm
 components.swf
 loadflash.js
 viewer.swf
 ColdFusion stores any data files in the presentation,
 including images, video clips, and SWF files referenced by the
 cfpresentationslide tags in a subdirectory called data.
 To run the presentation, open the index.htm file.
 If you do not specify a directory, the presentation
 runs in the client browser.

params.name: glowColor
params.description:
Specifies the color used for glow effects on the buttons.
 The value is hexadecimal: use the form "##xxxxxx" or "##xxxxxxxx",
 where x = 0-9 or AF; use two number signs or none.

params.name: initialTab
params.description:
Specifies which tab will be on top when the presentation is displayed.
 This applies only when the control value is normal:

params.name: lightColor
params.description:
Specifies the light color used for light-and shadow effects.
 The value is hexadecimal: use the form "##xxxxxx" or "##xxxxxxxx",
 where x = 0-9 or A-F; use two number signs or none.

params.name: overwrite
params.description:
Specifies whether files in the directory are overwritten.
 Specify this attribute only when the you specify the directory.
 yes: overwrites files if they are already present
 no: create new files

params.name: primaryColor
params.description:
Specifies the primary color of the presentation.
 The value is hexadecimal: use the form "##xxxxxx" or "##xxxxxxxx",
 where x = 0-9 or AF; use two number signs or none.

params.name: shadowColor
params.description:
Specifies the shadow color used for light-and shadow effects.
 The value is hexadecimal: use the form "##xxxxxx" or "##xxxxxxxx",
 where x = 0-9 or A-F; use two number signs or none.

params.name: showNotes
params.description: Specifies whether the notes tab is present:

params.name: showOutline
params.description: Specifies whether the outline is present:

params.name: showSearch
params.description: Specifies whether the search tab is present:

params.name: textColor
params.description: Specifies the color for all the text in the presentation user interface.

params.name: authpassword
params.description: Sends a password to the target URL for Basic Authentication. Combined with username to form a base64 encoded string that is passed in the Authenticate header.

params.name: authuser
params.description: Sends a user name to the target URL for Basic Authentication. Combined with password to form a base64 encoded string that is passed in the Authenticate header.

params.name: autoplay
params.description:
Specifies whether to play the presentation automatically:
 * true: the presentation automatically runs through the entire presentation at startup.
 * false: the user must click the Play button to start the presentation and click the Next button to advance to the next slide in the presentation.

params.name: loop
params.description:
Specifies whether the presentation runs in a loop:
 * true: the presentation restarts automatically after it ends.
 * false: the user must click the Play button to restart the presentation.

params.name: proxypassword
params.description: Password required by the proxy server.

params.name: proxyuser
params.description: User name to provide to the proxy server.

params.name: proxyhost
params.description: Host name or IP address of a proxy server to which to send the request.

params.name: proxyport
params.description: The port to connect to on the proxy server.

params.name: useragent
params.description: Text to put in the HTTP User-Agent request header field. Used to identify the request client software.

params.name: destination
params.description: Destination directory

params.name: format
params.description: Specifies file format for conversion. The `flashpaper` format has been deprecated since CF11+

example.title: A presentation with two slides
example.code:
<cfpresentation
	title = "text string"
	authPassword = "authentication password"
	authUser = "authentication user name"
	autoPlay = "yes"
	backgroundColor = "##cccccc"
	control = "normal"
	controlLocation = "right"
	format = "ppt"
	glowColor = "green"
	initialTab = "notes"
	destination = "ram:///filepath"
	directory = "praesi.ppt"
	lightColor = "yellow"
	loop = "no"
	overwrite = "yes"
	primaryColor = "blue"
	shadowColor = "##333333"
	showNotes = "yes"
	showOutline = "yes"
	showSearch = "yes"
	textColor = "black"
	userAgent = "Firefox"
>
<cfpresentationslide notes="Test" title="myText" duration="20">Slide 1</cfpresentationslide>
<cfpresentationslide notes="Test2" title="myText">Slide 2</cfpresentationslide>
<cfpresenter name="xyz"></cfpresenter>
</cfpresentation>
